If only they had built something that benefits people’s lives. Like being the largest US employer, providing over 2.3m jobs. Selling $500B+ in goods & providing affordable XMas gifts TODAY to 140m US customers. Not nearly as important as spreading socialism to young college kids. https://twitter.com/rbreich/status/1208417541137293314 QT @RBReich The Walton earns $4 million every hour. That’s roughly 80 times what the  median American worker earns in a year. 

This isn’t free-market capitalism.

This is oligarchy.

Instead of listening to Sheldon Adelson and other multibillionaire campaign contributors, it is time to start listening to the overwhelming majority of Americans who want a government and an economy that works for the many—not just the few.

The way I see it, this election is about who our government is going to work for—the wealthy and the well-connected, or working families like the ones I met in Burlington, Iowa?

I know which side I'm on. I'm fighting so that our government and our economy work for everyone. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMXF7e9XsAEbLYS.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMXF7e-W4AI6jnq.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMXF7e8WkAAGpvD.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMXF7e8W4AAuVo3.jpg

No court would let a trial to proceed this way—and neither should the Senate.

As we gather with loved ones for the holidays, a haunting story of the violence migrant families face trying to secure better lives. In this season of love, I pray we find the empathy to change our immoral immigration policies. This is a crisis in our power to end. https://twitter.com/leedsgarcia/status/1208434730779021312 QT @leedsgarcia The United States asylum policy is to demand children sleep on the streets in Mexico in encampments while tricking them because they're never going to give them asylum. This is pure evil trickery happening on our watch with little awareness & outrage.
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/21/us/border-migrants-kidnapping-mexico.html

In 1970, 30-year-olds had a 92% chance of earning more than their parents did at the same age.

By 2010, income per person doubled. But 30-year-olds only had a 50% shot at doing better than their parents.

We cannot afford more decades of decline. We must transform our economy.

A lot of people who struggle with imposter syndrome haven’t realized yet that what they’re actually competing with is intergenerational wealth.

Be patient and kind to yourself. https://twitter.com/rbreich/status/1208101639929810944 QT @RBReich Just a casual reminder that 60% of all wealth in America is inherited.

“Pull yourself up by the bootstraps” is a sham.

A monumental move to ensure federal workers can be there for the newest addition to their family. But we must go further by guaranteeing up to 6 months of paid family and medical leave nationwide.
https://twitter.com/rollcall/status/1208099983687389184 QT @rollcall About 2 million federal employees are about to be guaranteed 12 weeks of paid parental leave https://www.rollcall.com/news/congress/congress-poised-pass-paid-parental-leave-federal-workers

A handful of billionaires have spent hundred of millions of dollars buying elections and politicians.

Not our campaign.

I'm proud that we're the only campaign to have contributions from zero billionaires.

We represent working Americans, not the corporate elite.

We don't always have to agree, but we must be there for each other. We must empower each other. We must find common ground and build bridges across our differences to pursue the common good. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMVPrhBWsAIuibm.jpg

You’re damn right I’m an alarmist. 

The scientists tell us we must act immediately to end our fossil fuel dependence, and that is what I'm going to do.
